metadata.name: Suspicious Parent Double Extension File Execution
metadata.comment: Detect execution of suspicious double extension files in ParentCommandLine

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.doc.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.docx.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.xls.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.xlsx.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.ppt.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.pptx.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.rtf.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.pdf.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.txt.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.doc.js')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.docx.js')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.xls.js')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.xlsx.js')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.ppt.js')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.pptx.js')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.rtf.js')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.pdf.js')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('.txt.js'))) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.doc.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.docx.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.xls.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.xlsx.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.ppt.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.pptx.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.rtf.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.pdf.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.txt.lnk')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.doc.js')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.docx.js')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.xls.js')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.xlsx.js')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.ppt.js')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.pptx.js')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.rtf.js')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.pdf.js')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.txt.js'))))

output.summary: Detect execution of suspicious double extension files in ParentCommandLine
